name: Bob Biplane Kitty Hawk
description:
It's an alpha version I've developed in 2015 and I share it some years later. There is still temporary resources (particularely the sounds) and balancing adjustments.

Some features are missing, like saving scores, but the version is stable and playable.

Bob is an anonymous character a little simplet. In this game he drives a biplane against absurd enemies.
This is a horizontal scrolling shoot 'em up. Bob shoot automatically on more and more dangerous enemies.
The game has no other end than Bob's death. The goal is to pass as many assaults as possible with the highest score.
